title: Mike Reid - The Guvnors Last Stand DVDRip (2008)
description:
Mike Reid - The Guv'nors Last Stand, Live! - DVDRip (2008)

I have personally ripped the entire show from the original DVD to DivX AVI file format. The content is entirely unchanged. I have also scanned in the cover and included this. Sample File included.

A fantastic final performance - a terrific end to his career!

DVD Release Date - 27th October 2008
Runtime - 68 Minutes

Details from the DVD...

"The greatest adult comedian of all time, Mike Reid, in this intimate recording of his very last stand up performance before his untimely death in 2007. On stage at the Cliff Pavilion in Southend in 2006 and the last ever recorded footage at Bury Cottage, Stanstead in November 2006.
